ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Soloing a chanter
ygData.msgSnippet: Your welcome..so you ve got a lvl 21 bard?  I once had a lvl 27 bard (I ve played just about every class except Shaman and Ranger) and let me tell you at 27
ygData.messageBody:
Your welcome..so you've got a lvl 21 bard? I once had a lvl 27 bard (I've
played just about every class except Shaman and Ranger) and let me tell you
at 27 you get a nice song..Song of the Sirens I beleive it's called which
works just like a charm spell. Anyway at 21 you can get excellent exp at
Padulal Caverns at the bandit camps. I highly reccomend hunting there, no
other zone can compare to the exp you get there at your level. Once you hit
26 everything starts to green out. If you don't want to try that out again
try Neitherbain Lair or even the Karanas. Once you hit 28-30 Split Paw Lair
is a good place to hunt along with the other zones mentioned in the pervious
posts plus Sol A and Sol B in Lavastorm Mts.

Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Ceatlitus>
Shadowknight of the 30th Season

-----Original Message-----
From: threnodyangelfire [mailto:threnodyangelfire@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 14, 2004 3:31 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Soloing a chanter


Thank you so much both of you for your suggestions.

I can't believe I haven't thought of charm soloing... now i can't
wait to finish work so i can give it a go!

I like hhk, but so do a lot of other people. I'm trying to explore
outside the favourite zones - Steamfont is a favourite for my
newbies - i can remember the first time i looted a brownie and got
4pp from it! I was so happy. But it seems that the eq gods have
changed that now, and brownies aren't quite so rich.

I've also got a level 21 bard - any suggestions for levelling her?

Thanks for all your advice


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "STG2(SW) Pierce" <piercer@d...>
wrote:
> Soloing a lowbie chanter is hard, I currently have a lvl 12
enchanter and
> I've been charm sololing ever since I got the spell. But in your
30's and
> soloing you can try Dawnshroud peeks as was mentioned earlier,
Neitherbain
> Lair, Marus Seru and Echo Caverns. I am currently in EC. If you
want to
> try out groups check out High Hold Keep and Neitherbain Lair..you
can almost
> always find a group at HHK. Well good luck.
>
> Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Ceatlitus>
> Shadowknight of the 30th Season
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Angel Ocasio [mailto:d4bidden2000@y...]
> Sent: Wednesday, January 14, 2004 2:19 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Soloing a chanter
>
>
> Soloing a chanter can be difficult at lower levels but
> it gets a lot batter the higher you go.
>
> The most efficient way to solo a chanter is by
> charming. Learn it, master it, love it. Once you get
> the hang of it you won't want to stop.
>
> At 31 I was exping in Dawnshroud peaks. When i hit 33
> I moved to Crystal caverns. At around 43-44 i went to
> Ghuntak and Dulak. I went from 44 to 50 in 3 days in
> Dulak. I'm 51 now and I've been doing the entrance to
> the Hole, City of Mist, and soloing the first two
> boats in Dulak (StormWave and Lady Dirulia)
>
> Try this link for techniques etc http://www.therunes.net/
>
